results.title: Leg ulcers and hydroxyurea: report of three cases with essential thrombocythemia.
results.text_hl: CASE 1: A 65-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Thrombocythemia_Essential</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013920 @@@essential thrombocythemia@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Thrombocythemia_Essential</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013920 @@@ET@@@) had been taking oral @CHEMICAL_Hydroxyurea @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006918 @@@hydroxyurea@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Hydroxyurea @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006918 @@@HU@@@), 1,000 mg daily, for 7 years.

citations.NLM: Demirçay Z, Cömert A, Adigüzel C. Leg ulcers and hydroxyurea: report of three cases with essential thrombocythemia. Int J Dermatol. 2002 Dec;41(12):872-4. PMID: 12492973
